content.body:
## Bug Report
iron-mines.spec.ts failing on session list visibility check.

## ğŸ› Bug Description
iron-mines.spec.ts failing on session list visibility check.

## ğŸ“ Steps to Reproduce
1. Run `npx playwright test tests/e2e/iron-mines.spec.ts`
2. Observe flakiness in session list visibility checks.

## âœ… Expected Behavior
Session list should be visible immediately after navigation.

## âŒ Actual Behavior
Timeout while waiting for locator.

## ğŸ“‹ Error Logs
Check GitHub Actions CI logs for latest failure.

## ğŸ” Debug Context
Playwright / E2E Environment.

## ğŸ“ Suspected Files
[tests/e2e/iron-mines.spec.ts](https://github.com/Techlemariam/IronForge/blob/main/tests/e2e/iron-mines.spec.ts)
content.title: [BUG] Fix Iron Mines E2E Flakiness
